body: I just knew people were gonna bitch about the ending, grow some balls you pansies. Its not NTR they never even loved each other, the girls just a slut. You all have to stop self inserting cause when stuff like this happens and you’re upset you only have yourself to blame. If you want to keep self inserting as the “man who’s penis is NOT significantly bigger than the competition” then by all means but just know you are just speaking into reality that you have a small dick and men with larger cocks can pleasure your interest more than you. (Which 9/10 isn’t true but if you keep thinking like you all do, then guess what? It will be.)

People really gonna bitch that this is NTR. He thought she was hot, they banged, they weren't together. It didn't even imply he was really all that into her outside of sex. She moved on and he got some experience under his belt. Literally its a net positive for him.
Where i can read that different story?
How is this NTR? She's just a horny slut. They weren't into each other for anything but a quick fuck
Is it really necessary to end this doujin with a NTR event?

Wtf like literally your a witch make a potion to give him a orc voice and unlimited stamina like now if I made this story here is part two short version oops orc got killed in a accident oh I “accidentally” drank a potion that makes you only want me or oops the knights found the orc and he has been executed
